name: Reddit RES Nightmode fix
description: This is a style fix for RES 4.5. It fixes issues with dark text on dark backgrounds and introduces minor style tweaks.
additional_info:
ONLY INSTALL THIS IF YOU HAVE REDDIT ENHANCEMENT SUITE AND USE NIGHT MODE! Otherwise Reddit will just look weird to you.

Changelog:
-Fix should not longer affect new modmail subdomain.

Reddit changed their styling jan 2015, breaking a lot of readability for RES nightmode. This is a fix for most critical stuff like dark text on dark background until RES is updated. Edit: This fix works full time even with newer of RES versions because I like it. 

Full list of changes:

-No more black text in modmail/wiki/live threads because it was impossible to read on dark background.
-Quote color is a bit lighter for higher contrast.
-Removal of borders and background on new comments highlight (I think this is a gold feature?), instead a subtle border on the left side of the comment is displayed.
-Slimmed down comment section with reduced padding between comments.
-Code block background changed to dark.
-Yellow reddit status bar.
-Report form color fix.

If something serious is missing/seriously wrong, send a PM to me on Reddit, I don't really read reviews here.
